title: 怎么能死后不掉东西不少经验
author: qq1262289798

replies.author: woshouyin
replies.txt_content:
放下命令方块右键它，输入
/gameruale keepInventory true
然后再命令方块上放木板，在木板上放压力板
最后踩压力板
[wood_pressureplate]
[wood]
命令方块

replies.author: APMSZ
replies.txt_content: 有插件吧？还是命令方块？

replies.txt_content:
